data.title: New York Landing
data.meta_description: New York Landing is a premier community of houses for sale in Nampa, ID. With proximity to local attractions, excellent schools and a rich history, New York Landing subdivision makes quality of life as simple as going home.
data.text:
Prices starting as low as $369,990

Don’t miss out on the CBH Hot Savings Summer! Get up to $45,000* in extras to use toward your dream home!

$45k* for homes priced $600,000 and above

$35k* for homes priced $500,000 – $599,999

$30k* for homes priced $450,000 – $499,999

$25k* for homes priced $400,000 – $449,999

$20k* for homes priced $399,999 and under

See a CBH Sales Specialist for complete details!

Discover your dream lifestyle at New York Landing, the premier community for new homes in Nampa, Idaho. Nestled in the heart of Nampa, this vibrant neighborhood offers a perfect blend of urban convenience and serene living. Experience the essence of modern living with our meticulously designed homes that cater to your every need.

As a resident of New York Landing, you’ll relish the proximity to a plethora of local attractions, including exquisite dining, boutique shopping, renowned wineries, and an array of family-friendly activities in Downtown Nampa. Educational opportunities abound with excellent schools nearby, ensuring your children receive top-notch education.

Plus, history enthusiasts can explore the nearby Warhawk Air Museum, a testament to the region’s rich heritage. Embrace the warmth of community and the allure of a new home, welcoming you at New York Landing. Seize the opportunity to live in a community that perfectly balances urban accessibility with the tranquility of Idaho living. Your ideal home awaits at New York Landing in Nampa, Idaho.

Learn more about Nampa, Idaho here.

Shop all new available homes in Nampa here.
